name: Mini system
description:
In this game, you will find yourself on the ruins of a planet-building laboratory. You will move along the gravitational debris to revive and support the planets.

There are only three planets left, which come to life with crystals of their own color and, in turn, produce crystals of the colors of other planets. It is also necessary to maintain the state of the water with Valve and charge it with the sun with the help of a huge solar cannon!

 At the same time, moving over objects changes your gravity, you can walk on all planes with a blue laser.

You can also grab the inhabitants of the planets and carry them in your pockets ... I don't know why you need this ...
